title: Avoidme
author: Avoidme
created_time: December 03, 2023, 11:47:48 AMLast edit: December 24, 2023, 01:14:23 PM by Avoidme
content: 1. Every participant should create an account  here  2. Total $4K (Every week 1000$) worth of $ASET tokens are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants. Maximum individual weekly cap is 125$ASET tokens. Reward will be distribute to participants account on weekly basis.3. The bounty program will launched on December 4, 2023 and will run until January, 2024. 4. Team will distribute the reward after the weekend of every week. The team looks me very strong and communicative. They already distributed round 1 reward. So, hope the round 2 will be distributed in time.5. Any form of spamming or dishonest behavior will result in disqualification.6. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC if needed.1. Every participant should create an account  here and submit the registered email address and ASET deposit address(from website) in the bounty registration form.2. Telegram and Twitter Requirements:   - All participants must Follow AssetLink's -Follow AssetLink's Linkedin- Follow AssetLink'sTwitter  -Follow AssetLink'sTelegramGroup, -Follow AssetLink'sTelegram channel, -Follow AssetLink'sMedium -And subscribe to  Youtube   - All participants must join the BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.   - Discussing the bounty program in the project chat group will result in immediate disqualification from the     campaign and a permanent ban from the company chat group. Please direct your bounty-related questions to     the BTT Bounty Managers's Group.3. Misconduct and Violations:   - Any participant found engaging in unethical or fraudulent practices during any campaign will be disqualified.   - Participants using offensive language or participating in any form of financial misconduct will be disqualified.4. Adherence to Rules:   - Participants are required to follow the rules outlined in these campaigns. Failure to do so will result in rewards      not being granted as per the campaign's terms, and no negotiations will be entertained.5. Disqualification Consequences:   - Disqualified members will forfeit all the coins they have earned, and this action is irreversible.   - Disqualified members will not be individually notified about their disqualification. To review your status, please check the Status sheet.6. Weekly Reporting:   - All participants must submit their weekly reports for social campaigns on this bounty thread. Stakes will be   calculated on a weekly basis, and you are required to create new reports each week. Edited reports and proof of   authentication will not be counted. Here is report format Code:Week:Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …..............Tweets URL1...2.................Comment URL1. …2. …3. …4. ….................[b]Linkedin Campaign[/b]Linkedin Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Share Url:1. …2. …3. …4...............Post URL1...2...................[b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Telegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Telegram questions Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. …................. Telegram answer1.  …2. …3. …4. …5. ….............Comments1 …2. …3. …4. …5. ….............7. Authentication Proof:   - It is mandatory for all participants to submit proof of authentication in the campaign thread they are     participating in. Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username: Forum Profile Link: Telegram Username: Participated Campaigns:  ASET  Wallet Address:8. Stake Updates:   - Stakes will be updated on a weekly basis.Please ensure that you read and understand these terms and conditions thoroughly before participating in the bounty program. Violating these terms may lead to disqualification and the loss of earned rewards. Twitter              30%Linkedin            25%Telegram           25%Medium            20%Week 1 (04.12 -10.12)Week 2 (11.12 - 17.12)Week 3 (18.12 - 24.12)Week 4 (25.11 - 31.12)Rewards:○ Follow our Twitter page: 10 stakes○ Like a tweet: 5 stakes per tweet○ Retweet: 5 stakes per retweet○ Post a positive comment: 5 stakes per comment1. All participants must follow AssetLink’s officialTwitter andLinkedin Page. If you did not follow LinkedIn I will reject you. Thats the rule.2. Quote retweet the following: https://x.com/AtivoLabs/status/1738876046617805034?s=20using this text: AssetLink is the next 1000x RWA gem. CEX listing very soon: @AtivoLabs $ASET #RWA3. Participants are required to like post, retweet 5 tweets and create atleast 2 new tweets each week. If anyone want to earn more they can comment more for more stakes.4. There should be a minimum 24-hour gap between each retweet or tweet.5. Like the post before retweet. In each retweet incorporate following hashtags: #AssetLink $ASET #RWA #RealEstate 6.  In each tweet mention @ativolabs, should have coincise but valuable comment and incorporatefollowing hashtags:#AssetLink $ASET #RWA #RealEstate How to join:1. Join AssetLink's TelegramGroup, Telegram channeland Twitter.2. Join BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.3. Complete the registration form by clicking on this link:[TWITTER FORM]Rewards:Join our main Telegram channel: 15 stakes TelegramGroup● Join our secondary Telegram channel: 15 stakes Telegram channel● Active participation (determined weekly): 20 stakes1. Welcome New Members:   - Greet and introduce new members to the Telegram group, providing them with essential information about the project and its goals.2. Assist and Clarify:   - Address queries from new members, offering clear and concise answers to ensure everyone understands the project and its key aspects.3. Do not wear AssetLink avatar or name. You can wear your picture or any other avatar. Do not spam on the group. 4. Ask project related question on the main chat group. Atleast 5 everyday5. Answer other member question answer. Atleast 5 everyday6. Make some coincise and valuable comment about the projects. Atleast 5 everydayBy performing these tasks, we aim to create a vibrant and inclusive community where members are well-informed, engaged, and excited about the project's development.How to join:1. Join AssetLink's TelegramGroup, Telegram channel and Linkedin Page. If you did not follow LinkedIn I will reject you. Thats the rule.2. Join BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.3. Complete the registration form by clicking on this link: [TELEGRAM FORM]Rewards:○ Follow our LinkedIn page: 10 points○ Like a post: 5 points per post○ Share a post: 10 points per share1.Every participant should follow LinkedIn2. LinkedIn accounts must have a some connection.3. Participants are required to like all posts of official AssetLink LinkedIn and share 5 of post each week.4. There should be a minimum 24-hour gap between each post or share.5. Like the post before share and In each share incorporate following hashtags: #AssetLink $ASET #RWA #RealEstate How to join:1. Join AssetLink's TelegramGroup, Telegram channeland LinkedIn. If you did not follow LinkedIn I will reject you. Thats the rule.2. Join BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.3. Complete the registration form by clicking on this link: [LinkedIn FORM]Rewards:○ Follow our Medium page: 10 stakes○ Write an article about our project (400+ words, include official links, no BTTprogram mentions): 40 stakes○ Clap for an article: 5 stakes per articleRules:1.  You should follow the AsseLlink official Medium.2. You should clap all the the article of AsseLlink official Medium.3. Each participant is allowed to write a maximum of 4 original articles (No more than 1 Article in a week).4. Articles must be of high quality, unique, and contain a minimum of 300 words.   - You may use official images, logos, and graphics from our website.5. Stakes will be awarded based on article quality and the level of engagement, among other criteria.6. Articles should be published only on Medium, 7. The content of the articles should revolve around relevant topics, such as Project features, Staking/Liquidity rewards, Presale, the latest project's token updates, Blockchain, and so on.8. Only high-quality, original content will be accepted. Removal or deletion will result in disqualification.9. Published articles must include at least 2 images related to the project and provide links to Proof of Authentication, the project's website, Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other social media.10. Please do not mention BTT program or your name in the article. If you mention , you will be rejected.9. By participating in this program, participants acknowledge that the project's team may use these articles as marketing materials.How to join:How to join:1. Join AssetLink's Medium and Linkedin Page. If you did not follow LinkedIn I will reject you. Thats the rule.2. Join BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.3. Complete the registration form by clicking on this link: [MEDIUM FORM]Disclaimer: This bounty campaign operates without an official escrow service. I cannot provide a guarantee regarding the distribution of rewards upon the campaign's conclusion. However, I have confidence in the team's strength and communication capabilities. Therefore, I hope that rewards will be distributed as planned and in a timely manner. Participation in this bounty campaign, investment in their ICO/IDO/IEO, or utilization of their platform is at your own discretion and risk. I cannot be held responsible in the event that the developers or project team fail to meet their stated goals or obligations to bounty participants, investors, or any other stakeholders.
